revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Nom du PNJ !! Lieu !! Rôle |- | Lauréat Concours Pokémon || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Bonaugure]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Mesprit. |- | Professeur Sorbier || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Sandgem Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Aurore || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Sandgem Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Manaphy. |- | Fleuriste || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Floaroma Town]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Location-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Eevee into Leafeon. |- | Fillette Caroline || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Eterna City]] || Informs the player about the [[Old Chateau|location]] and [[Dungeons#Sinnoh/fr|requirement]] for Rotom and its forms. |- | Ouvrier || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Oreburgh City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Nosepass into Probopass. |- | Fan Concours Pokémon || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Hearthome City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Magneton into Magnezone. |- | Gardien du Parc des Amis || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Pal Park]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Cherrim (overcast) into Cherrim (sunny). |- | Armand || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the requirement to evolve Riolu. |- | Gamin || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Cresselia. |- | Fillette || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Snowpoint City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Eevee into Glaceon. |- | Femme aux Rubans Claudia || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Sunyshore City]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Level-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Pilowswine into Mamoswine. |- | Top Dresseur Quinn || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Fight Area]] || Informs the player about the requirement to unlock [[Distortion World]]. |- | Montagnard Kevin || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Survival Area]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
revision.comment: Created page with "{| class="wikitable" |- ! Nom du PNJ !! Lieu !! Rôle |- | Lauréat Concours Pokémon || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Bonaugure]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Mesprit. |- | Professeur Sorbier || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Sandgem Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Aurore || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh/fr|Sandgem Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Manaphy. |- | Fleuriste || Town..."
